code: import{AUTHENTICATION,LOGOUT}from'../ACTIONS/UserAction';var initialState={token:null,userId:null};var userReducer=function userReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case AUTHENTICATION:return{token:action.token,userId:action.userId};case LOGOUT:return initialState;default:return state;}};export default userReducer;
